locations.title: Rusty Key
locations.description: In the dark room before the Rusty Key door, guarded by a Banished Knight

locations.title: Under a Golden Seed tree on the way to Godrick the Grafted
Curved Sword Talisman
locations.description: In a chest in the dark room before the Rusty Key door, guarded by a Banished Knight

locations.title: Claw Talisman
locations.description: Right outside Rampart Tower Site of Grace (or higher up), jump to an adjacent rooftop to the east. Find the debris of a fallen-over pillar, jump up to the ledge above it, follow the ledge to a small courtyard, and climb a long ladder there

locations.title: Boltdrake Talisman
locations.description: Up the stairs after the Limgrave Tower Bridge site of grace
